hamburgers.description: The Cherry Bomb burger tastes like a sundae with a cherry on top. It was created to satisfy the sugary lovers.
hamburgers.name: Cherry Bomb

hamburgers.description: Hickory Dicory Dock the hamburger has hit the spot. Drizzled with hickory sauce this burger will leave your senses in awe.
hamburgers.name: The Hickory Dickory

hamburgers.description: Do you dream of the stars at night? The Astro Burger is the perfect astroid you're taste buds have been dying to taste.
hamburgers.name: Astro Burger

hamburgers.description: Is it Tuesday afternoon and raining yet? Come grab a bite with your Crazy Tuesday burger.
hamburgers.name: Crazy Tuesday Burger

hamburgers.description: Aww! now you're ready to indulge. You want to get ready to sleep in all weekend and get loaded on the Fat Friday!
hamburgers.name: Fat Friday Burger

hamburgers.description: So Fat Friday has settled in and now you're looking for a sprucer. Our special tamale tomato sauce will awaken you from your slumber.
hamburgers.name: Sleepy Sunday Burger

hamburgers.description: This one is slopped with a heavy amount of our name brand hickory sauce and tends to drip all over you so we named it 'Sloppy Bob.'
hamburgers.name: The Sloppy Bob

hamburgers.description: The Pepperoni Burg was created to satisfy our fans who are craving a pizza at the same time as a burger. Filled with mozzerrella and cheddar and loaded with pepperoni.
hamburgers.name: Pepperoni Burg
